content: नाशः [नश्-मावे घञ्] {@--1@} Disappearance; गता नाशं तारा उपकृतमसाधाविव जने <ls>Mk. 5. 25.</ls> {@--2@} Frustration, destruction, ruin, loss; <ls>Bg. 2. 40</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 88</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 67</ls>; so वित्त°, बुद्धि° &c. {@--3@} Death. {@--4@} Misfortune, calamity. {@--5@} Abandonment, desertion. {@--6@} Flight, retreat. {@--7@} (In arith.) Elimination. {@--8@} Want of apprehension, non-perception (अनुपलंभ).
